err.invalidLatOrLon: The provided latitude or longitude is not valid.

common.coordLocationAskConfirmation:
The location found for coordinates `{{latitude}},{{longitude}}` is **{{info.location}}**.
Is this correct?

err.commandError: I encountered a problem executing that command. Please try again later.

err.destExists: This channel is already designated as an alert destination.
err.noDestById: No alert destination exists with the ID `{{id}}`.
err.couldNotRemoveDest: The alert destination could not be removed. Please try again later.
err.noDestInChannel: {{channel}} does not have any alert reporting assigned to it.

alerts.destCreated:
Alert reporting created in {{channel}}!
You can remove this reporting destination by using the `/alerts remove` command with the ID `{{destination.id}}`.
alerts.destRemoved: Alert reporting destination has been successfully removed.

err.noDestById: No forecast destination exists with the ID `{{id}}`.
err.couldNotRemoveDest: The forecast destination could not be removed. Please try again later.
err.noDestInChannel: {{channel}} does not have any forecast reporting assigned to it.

forecasts.destCreated:
Hourly forecast reporting created in {{channel}}!
You can remove this reporting destination by using the `/forecasts remove` command with the ID `{{destination.id}}`.
forecasts.destRemoved: Forecast destination has been successfully removed.

radarChannel.destCreated:
Radar channel destination successfully set to {{channel}}!
Note that I will only update my initial message in the channel so you should disallow members from sending messages in it.
You can delete my radar message or the channel it is in to remove this destination.

radar.embedFooter: The closest station that covers this area is {{radarStation}}.
